channel.title: Mastermind Team's Robcast
channel.description:
Robcast is the incessant chatter about what's important.And between you and me, the best thing about Robcast is its free.
[WARNING] Foul language, thoughts & views.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Discussing shit that matters.

item.title: Episode 49: Fapanese
item.description: Rob Lee & Tron discuss geeky deviancy, Asian commerce, GI Joe, NFL playoff conspiracies, the animal apocalypse and much more. Thanks for listening.

item.title: Episode 31: April Foolin' part 1
item.description: Like any greedy movie producer, the gang has decided to make this a franchise - well at least this episode will have two parts. The treacherous three (cool, huh. better than threesome) are talking about everything in recent news from the Howard Stern/Jaimie Foxx beef to a 72 year old grandma getting tasered and much more. Enjoy.

item.title: Episode 30: The Big - bleeping - Deal
item.description: The gang is back to discuss health care, Tea Baggers going ape shit and other foul-mouthed commentary. Also, yer beloved ear porn, Mastermind Team's Robcast, is 1 year old - help us celebrate by becoming a Facebook fan - Mastermind Team's Robcast. PS. If yer in Baltimore, come out the Free Comic Book Day at the Collector's corner on 7911 Harford Road, Baltimore MD.

item.description: Rob & Tee are back with a friend, Cheri, and they will do Minority report. Nope the Cruise movie, but a dialogue on race relations in America presented by three minorities.

item.title: Episode 21:If it bleeds it leads
item.description: The band is back together and discussing how the news isn't the news. It seems to the gang that "news" is agenda-based opinions. Give it a listen and share yer comments.

item.title: Episode 19: See you next Fall...
item.description: One more 'til 20. The gang discusses what they're looking forward to during the Fall.Rob expresses his new found love for infomercials. The gang discusses the shitty shows debuting or returning this Fall.As always thanks for listening and please spread the word!

item.title: Episode 18: Jada died before the credits...
item.description: The gang discusses horror movie cliche/plot elements and how they'd survive many horror movie subgenres. They also, talk about the most respected horror movie sequel - yes, Gremlins 2 is a horror movie. If you too want to make a horror movie, read this: http://tinyurl.com/m6ezfg

item.description: The gang discusses some of the most rude behaviors/acts that occur at work,school or out & about. Eventually, hatecast ensues. Enjoy!!!

item.title: Episode 16: Slurcast
item.description: Yer boy Rob Goodtimes, Rick Right and Tee are talking race. The gang discusses how stupid slurs are. Enjoy, The intro song, "Big Dreamz" is provided by Spade of North Star Records.

item.title: Episode 14: I want to apologize for ...
item.description: The gang's all back and making fun of people with PR motivated apologies.The gang discusses how politicians and public figures can do something bad and erase it with an apology. But do they mean it? You be the judge.
item.dc:creator: MTR The Network
item.itunes:summary: The gang's all back and making fun of people with PR motivated apologies.The gang discusses how politicians and public figures can do something bad and erase it with an apology. But do they mean it? You be the judge.

item.title: Episode 13: Knife Fights in Warehouses
item.description: The gang makes their triumphant return to Robcast. Did everyone survive the Celebrity Holocaust? The gang also remembers the King of Pop. Check it out.
item.dc:creator: MTR The Network
item.itunes:summary: The gang makes their triumphant return to Robcast. Did everyone survive the Celebrity Holocaust? The gang also remembers the King of Pop. Check it out.

item.title: Episode 12: Go, Go, Mastermind Team?
item.description: The gang discusses some of their favorite childhood memories. Since we're all nerds, we're discussing mainly our favorite cartoon and other shit we watched or experienced as kids. Kids? We're only in our 20s. Enjoy.
item.dc:creator: MTR The Network
item.itunes:summary: The gang discusses some of their favorite childhood memories. Since we're all nerds, we're discussing mainly our favorite cartoon and other shit we watched or experienced as kids. Kids? We're only in our 20s. Enjoy.

item.title: Episode 11:Battle of the sexes
item.description: The band is back together to talk hate. By hate, we're talking about what men hate about women and what women hate about men. I will put the toilet seat back down.Check this out.
